definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: The investigation, they are not subjected to nuclear contamination.
sentences.chinese: 經查，它們並未受到核污染。

sentences.english: Again, it will be impossible to include everything from the exegetical study.
sentences.chinese: 再次重申，講道不可能包括解經查考的所有內容。

sentences.english: As the information provided by the applicant is found to be true, the application is approved.
sentences.chinese: 經查申請人上述填寫資料屬實，同意所請。

sentences.english: Changde was taken to hospital, as is to make brain blood clot.
sentences.chinese: 常德被送進醫院，經查是突犯腦淤血。

sentences.english: The center will refuse HIV positive donating blood if they are on the list.
sentences.chinese: 如經查屬不適捐血名單，即婉拒捐血。

sentences.english: Through investigation, it was found the illegal server was located in the IDC machine room of Jilin Telecom Company.
sentences.chinese: 經查，私服服務器位置在吉林市網通公司IDC機房。

sentences.english: The control button of STAURN-C is not sensitive. The interface between keyboard and CPU has been found disconnected.
sentences.chinese: 站鍵控不靈敏，經查發現鍵盤接口與CPU插頭斷了。

definition: to track down and seize (a criminal suspect, contraband etc)
to bring to justice/to hand over to the law
to order the arrest of sb as criminal/to list as wanted
to search for and seize (criminals, smuggled goods etc)
